title: Turning Point Integrative Health Centers
description: Turning Point Integrative Health Centers offer top-notch family practice medicine combined with a more integrative and functional approach to achieving true wellness.
cleaned_text: The field of integrative health and medicine reaffirms the importance of the relationship between practitioner and patient, focuses on the whole person, is informed by evidence, and makes use of all appropriate therapeutic approaches, healthcare professionals and professions to achieve optimal health and healing.
